scripts.deploy-storybook: build-storybook && aws s3 sync storybook-static s3://components.bounties.network/ --acl public-read
scripts.deploy-berlin: APP_SETTINGS_FILE=berlin_settings APP_LOGO=berlin_logo npm run build && aws s3 sync build/. s3://berlin.bounties.network --acl public-read --exclude index.html --cache-control max-age=31536000 && aws s3 cp build/index.html s3://berlin.bounties.network --acl public-read --cache-control 'no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate'
